officially launched its flagship product – the MetaOne® Wallet. In order to
simplify and ease the onboarding of new users into the Metaverse economy, the
MetaOne Wallet gets rid of the requirement for users to remember or safely store
their private keys and seed […]

who may finally be able to get some of their money back may also have to pay […]

San Francisco, USA, 13th December, 2022, Chainwire Azarus will be hosting a
keynote stream in partnership with Animoca Brands at 7am UTC on Wednesday,
December 14th (11pm PST on Tuesday, December 13th) to reveal the imminent
listing on Uniswap of the AzaCoin, an ERC-20 Token on Ethereum Mainnet, which
will list on Uniswap on January […]
articles.title: Gaming Platform Azarus to list on Uniswap – onramps multi-million streaming audience to blockchain

articles.author: chainwire
articles.description:
Hong Kong, Hong Kong, 13th December, 2022, Chainwire Platypus Finance is
launching USP, a protocol-native stablecoin. USP’s deployment has emerged from
Platypus’ goal of improving capital efficiency for its users. USP also resolves
long-running collateral issues associated with stablecoins. The native Platypus
Finance stablecoin has been designed to reduce the liquidity fragmentation and
scattered assets […]
articles.title: Platypus Launches Native Stablecoin USP

articles.author: chainwire
articles.description:

220,000 BNX Cyber Incubation Fund, aimed at driving the growth and adoption of
Web3 games.  The fund, supported by the project team, seed investors and members
of the BNX community, will be used to invest in on-chain gaming projects that
utilize or are experimenting with […]
articles.title: BinaryX Introduces Cyber Incubation Fund to Support Blockchain Games

articles.title: Oracle Evolution

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Fantom Voted For Gas Monetization Fantom governance passed the gas monetization proposal, in which Fantom will reduce the burn rate from 20% to 5%, and redirect the 15% to incentivize usage/transactions of Fantom dApps. Celsius Owns Account Assets The Judge of the Celsius bankruptcy case ruled that the funds deposited to Earn Accounts, which amount to $4.2 billion, are the property of Celsius, not the investors.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Fantom Gas Monetization, Celsius Owns Account Assets, Own and Earn on Bluechip NFTs, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Uniswap Router Vulnerability Uniswap recently introduced Router, a new feature that unifies ERC20 and NFT swapping into a single swap router, however security firm Dedaun found a vulnerability in Router that could potentially cause reentrancy exploits and fund losses.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Uniswap Router Vulnerability, Wyre to Shut Down, Leveraged Trading on Arbitrum, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Recap: Week of Dec. 26th
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - LlamaSwap Live, Sushi New Tokenomics, Convex cvxCRV Update, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Insrt Live NFTfi yield protocol Insrt launches on Ethereum. The first deployed vault type is ShardVault, which allows users to take a directional bet that the price of a bluechip NFT collection goes up and farm yield passively. Vader Shutting Down Stablecoin protocol Vader announces the plan to shut down as the team found no notable breakthrough in the algorithmic stablecoin design that is capital efficient.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Insrt Live, Vader Shutting Down, On-Chain DCA, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Mean Finance Live on Ethereum Previously on Polygon and L2s, DCA protocol Mean Finance is now available on Ethereum, offering DCA tools with MEV-protected & gasless swaps. Gamma Strategies on Arbitrum Uniswap V3 liquidity management protocol Gamma Strategies launches on Arbitrum, supporting new pairs for Arbitrum-based assets.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Mean Finance on Ethereum, Gamma Strategies on Arbitrum, Strategy for the Calm Market, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Recap: Week of Dec. 19th
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - Synthetix Perps V2, Visa Autopayments, NEAR Metamask Compatibility, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Synthetix Perps V2 Live Synthetix launches perps v2 with frontends on Optimism. Perps V2 reduces perps fees by using an off-chain oracle system and minimizes risks for perps LPs with new risk management features. Waves USDN Resolution Plan Waves team released a resolution plan for its severely depegged stablecoin USDN, aiming to stabilize the peg with proposals including token backings, team donations, swap reactivation, incentives for reserve holders, and adaptive vesting for USDN holders.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Synthetix Perps V2 Live, Waves USDN Resolution Plan, Delta-Neutral Strategies, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Symbiosis V2 Cross-chain AMM Symbiosis launches V2, enabling a serving network (Boba BNB L2) and single-sided AMM pool, making it easier to support more chains and increasing pool efficiency. OpenOcean Cross-chain Swap OpenOcean launches 1-click cross-chain swap, supporting multiple chains with better swap rates and better UX by implementing Celer’s IM Framework.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Symbiosis V2, OpenOcean Swap Aggregator, IL-less DEX, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: NEAR MetaMask Compatibility NEAR developer Proximity Labs releases NETH, a smart contract that allows users to directly interact with NEAR dApps using their Ethereum wallets, such as MetaMask. Sturdy V1 Live Lending protocol Sturdy releases a revamped UI for 1.0, including integrated information and historical yield graphs. Sturdy also expands into the ETH market and will allow users to deposit LSDs as collateral to borrow ETH.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - NEAR MetaMask Compatibility, Sturdy V1, Trading Perps on Solana, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Fluidity Live Fluidity, a protocol that rewards users for actually using their cryptos, is live on Ethereum. Users can wrap their tokens into fAssets and start earning rewards for transacting. The rewards are generated by user assets lent to money markets.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Fluidity Live, Visa Autopayments, Trading Expirables on Arbitrum, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Product Launches 🚀 Multichain multiBTC Live Multichain launches multiBTC and a BTC bridge. Meanwhile, Curve launches a multiBTC/WBTC/sBTC pool and launched a proposal vote for adding liquidity incentives to the pool. Yearn veYFI Live Yearn launched the staking UI for veYFI. Previously, users can take part in governance using YFI, and going forward veYFI will be the only governance token on Yearn.
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - multiBTC Live, SBF Arrested, Ren to Shut Down 1.0, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Magic Eden Supports Polygon NFT marketplace Magic Eden now supports buy/sell/mint Polygon NFTs. Phi Launches on Polygon Phi.xyz, a metaverse project built around ENS & wallet activities, launches Phi Land & Phi Quest on Polygon, allowing users to create lands and/or explore quests of projects.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Magic Eden Supports Polygon, Phi Live on Polygon, DEX Aggregator with No Slippage, and More...

articles.description: Maple Released 2.0 Maple releases a new version that focuses on diversifying borrowers and improving risk management parameters. Maple recently experienced a borrower default. MakerDAO to Fund RWA MakerDAO passed the executive vote and will deploy four vaults to fund investments in real-world assets (RWA), originated by BlockTower and issued on-chain through
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Maple 2.0, MakerDAO to Fund RWA, Stable Farms on Optimism, and More...

articles.description: Yearn veYFI Live Yearn launches UI for users to stake YFI for veYFI. Previously, users can take part in governance using YFI, and going forward veYFI will be the only governance token on Yearn. Signal Vote: Increase Sushi Kanpai Payout Ratio The Sushiswap community is voting to produce a signal on whether to redirect 100% of the Sushi fees redirect to the Kanpai Treasury for 1-year.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Yearn veYFI Live, Sushi Voting to Increase Treasury Ratio, Trading Volatility, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: MakerDAO Key Deployments Maker executed a bunch of proposals today. Key deployments include DSR Savings increase to 1%, GNO onboarding, and renBTC-A offboarding, among other changes. SBF Arrested SBF has been arrested in the Bahamas the day before appearing before Congress. Reports say the US is likely to request extradition.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - MakerDAO Key Deployments, SBF Arrested, Interest-Free Borrowing, and More...

articles.description: Perennial Live Derivatives protocol Perennial is now live on the Ethereum mainnet. Perennial offers infrastructure for derivative markets, with V1 currently supporting Long-ETH, Short-ETH, and Long-Squeeth markets. Compound Extensions Compound releases Extensions for its V3 users. Extensions are a series of add-on features to enhance users’ experience, including Advance Transactions, Position Migrator, Position Management (by
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Perennial Live, Compound Extensions, Farming on Arbitrum, and More...
